summary: Hino Maori's day is strategically planned to focus on revitalizing energy in the morning, completing a work project, maintaining health, and concluding with relaxation in the evening.
priority_goals: Engage in a physical exercise for health

high_level_tasks.description: Start the day with a refreshing routine and breakfast to gain energy.
sub_tasks: MoveToArea: Kitchen in Hino Maori's Apartment

high_level_tasks.description: Focus on completing the planned work project in a dedicated time block.
high_level_tasks.location: Living Room in Hino Maori's Apartment
sub_tasks: MoveToArea: Living Room in Hino Maori's Apartment
UseObject: Home office desk and computer

high_level_tasks.description: Allocate time for physical health by engaging in a workout routine.
Have a nutritious lunch and engage in a social activity.
high_level_tasks.location: Living Room in Hino Maori's Apartment
sub_tasks: MoveToArea: Kitchen in Hino Maori's Apartment
TalkToNPC: Connect with a friend or family member

high_level_tasks.description: End the day with leisure activities and a balanced dinner.
high_level_tasks.location: Living Room in Hino Maori's Apartment
sub_tasks: PerformActivity: Read a book or watch a show
